**Desciption**: Path to the directory containing bioflux-files
"Prefix of the the bioflux-files. Filenames are assumed to be ```{vprm_prefix}YYYYMMDDHH.nc``. If multiple bioflux-datasets exists
**Used in**: this is a list of prefixes. All files are assumed to be in ``vprm_dir``"

**Desciption**: "Path to the processed CAMS-files. Processed CAMS-files are stored here
**Used in**: if there are files found here then ```cams_dir_orig`` is not used"
more information in ```config.py`` of example case"

**Desciption**: "Number of hours between restarts of cosmo"
